requirement.en: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster, shuffle 2 LIGHT Attribute monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: This turn, 1 face-up LIGHT Attribute monster on your field gains ATK equal to [the ATK of that Normal Summoned monster] and cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
